title.rendered: STEDI USB C VOLT METER – FLUSH MOUNT

content.rendered:
DETAILS

Stedi’s flush mounted USB C charging port offers incredibly fast charging of your smart phone or tablet.

  • Blue LED Back Light (volt meter)
  • Gauge has 360 degree rotation for vertical and horizontal mounting
  • Flush mounted

*This product only includes the USB C Volt Meter. Flush Mount plate sold separately*

TECH SPECS

MOUNT Flush
COMPATIBILITY 12v-24v
VOLT METER BACK LIGHT Blue
TOP USB SOCKET Output (USB C PD 2.0 port): 5V @ 2.4A, 9V @ 2A, 12V @ 1.5A
BOTTOM USB SOCKET Output (USB A QC3.0 port): 5V @ 2.4A, 9V @ 2A, 12V @ 1.5A

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x USB C Volt Meter Flush Mount

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI USB C VOLT METER FLUSH MOUNT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
